title: WANTED: T206 Chance (red) and T206 Sweeney Bost. and T206 Mullin Mullen

posts.post_title: WANTED: T206 Chance (red) and T206 Sweeney Bost. and T206 Mullin Mullen
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott Levy
Ladies and Gents:



Need these three cards to wrap the set (minus the majors)

Looking for them in PSA 4, 5 or 6



Also will trade a Jennings Port sgc 70 for comparable PSA Jennings Port or

Will trade my Chance red (SGC 60) for PSA 5 in the same card.



Regards,

Scott
